scripts.install:all: npm run install-preboot && npm run install-universal && npm run install-broccoli-pre && npm run install-engine && npm run install-grunt-pre && npm run install-gulp-pre && npm run install-hapi-engine && npm run install-polyfills && npm run install-webpack-pre && typings install && npm run install-examples
scripts.dev:reload:universal: npm run reload:universal && npm run reload:examples
scripts.reload:universal: cd ./modules/universal && npm run reload && npm run build
scripts.reload:examples: cd ./examples && npm run reload && npm run build
scripts.install-preboot: cd ./modules/preboot && typings install && npm install --ignore-scripts && npm run build
scripts.install-universal: cd ./modules/universal && typings install && npm install --ignore-scripts && npm run build
scripts.install-broccoli-pre: cd ./modules/broccoli-prerender && typings install && npm install --ignore-scripts && npm run build
scripts.install-engine: cd ./modules/express-engine && typings install && npm install --ignore-scripts && npm run build
scripts.install-grunt-pre: cd ./modules/grunt-prerender && typings install && npm install --ignore-scripts && npm run build
scripts.install-gulp-pre: cd ./modules/gulp-prerender && typings install && npm install --ignore-scripts && npm run build
scripts.install-hapi-engine: cd ./modules/hapi-engine && typings install && npm install --ignore-scripts && npm run build
scripts.install-polyfills: cd ./modules/polyfills && typings install && npm install --ignore-scripts && npm run build
scripts.install-webpack-pre: cd ./modules/webpack-prerender && typings install && npm install --ignore-scripts && npm run build
scripts.install-examples: cd ./examples && typings install && npm run reload && npm run build
scripts.remove-local-modules: rimraf node_modules/angular2-universal-polyfills node_modules/angular2-universal node_modules/preboot node_modules/angular2-universal-preview node_modules/angular2-universal node_modules/angular2-express-engine node_modules/angular2-hapi-engine
scripts.restart: npm run update && gulp build && gulp server
scripts.loop-install: for dir in modules/[a-zA-Z0-9]* ; do printf "=== Installing %s\n" "$dir" ; ( cd "$dir"; npm install && typings install; ) ;printf "=== Installation exit code: %s for %s\n" $? "$dir" ; done
scripts.loop-build: for dir in modules/[a-zA-Z0-9]* ; do printf "=== Building %s\n" "$dir" ; ( cd "$dir"; npm run build; ) ;printf "=== Building exit code: %s for %s\n" $? "$dir" ; done
